name: Ray'n Nug
description:
A divine power fueled manta ray and a cyborg snapping shrimp are your two companions in a frantic fight against the mechanization of the world's waters !
But the clock is ticking ! Be quick ! 

/!\ The game may not be suited for color blindness /!\

/!\ The game requires a controller to be played /!\

Ray'n Nug is a 3D shoot'em up inspired mainly by the classics of the genre such as Star Fox 64 and Panzer Dragoon but also by the Sonic the Hedgehog franchise. 
The game aims to create an harmony between classic 3D shoot'em up and racing games. This results in a highly competitive game with a boost button as a core mechanic.

Ray'n Nug is :

  • An harmony between two unexpected genres
  • A huge focus on mobility
  • A scoring system linked to how fast you complete a level
  • A game with high replay value ! Study, experiment and master it !
  • Full of micro optimisation and hard to master mechanics to come on top of your friend's scores !

An instruction manual is bundled with the game as a pdf file as well as integrated in the game's menus to learn everything you need !

This is the third and last year project of students at e-artsup Bordeaux, in France. The game was made in 8 months with 2 days per weeks.
This version of the game has been slightly modified to answer criticism, fix important bugs and translate the game in english.

The dev high score is 428652 ! Try to beat us !
